ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 6
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s a thought...maybe it has something to do with the creatures Magic Resistance?? Reds almost never stick....yellows do sometimes...and anything lower does
ygData.messageBody:
Here's a thought...maybe it has something to do with the creatures
Magic Resistance??


Reds almost never stick....yellows do sometimes...and anything lower
does almost always......so....the creature's LEVEL obviously has something
to do with it...




From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...> on 04/21/99 08:48
AM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Digest Number 6

From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>

Most EQ webpages dedicated to enchanting seem to be in debate over
this
issue. I have seen none suggesting Int and Wis are involved. As of
right now its ovbiously a mystery. Either the formula is complex,
with
multiple factors, or so bugged that noone can tell for sure. Please
try
and be a little more open of differing opinions, and a little less
convinced that you are right and everyone else is wrong.


-----Original Message-----
From: Clint Chenault [mailto:ccc@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:47 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Digest Number 6


From: Clint Chenault <ccc@...>


You guys who think charisma affects spells in any way obviously are
newbies because if you had read any eq web pages
you;d know it only affects the way towns, merchants, guards and
others
view you. the only thing its good for is
Merchant prices higher CHA = Lower prices for you and Higher prices
when
u sell.
I believe Int or Wis is what affects the chance of resisting
Thorn
